presentation.innerHtml:
Сценарий (тип 40??)
1. На экране появляется текст.
2. Студент читает данный текст.
3. Через 30 секунд становится активной кнопка «Далее»

children.innerHtml: This tutorial will take you through the steps of setting up and configuring a simple mail server (SMTP, POP3, IMAP) on Debian/Linux. The instructions will be given for Debian, but they can be adapted quite simply to other distributions such as Ubuntu and other Debian-based OSes; you could even pretty much follow the same steps if you're running Red-Hat based systems such as CentOS or Fedora. I can promise you that this is as easy as it gets, provided you have correctly verified and validated the pre-requisites step.
